Comments_List: Established a strong foundation in Persian to continue building on

Im glad this class meets every day. Ostad is a great teacher and instructor - she explains things very clearly.

I really appreciate the emphasis on learning cultural material and find it valuable - but I would prefer if less time in class had been spent on going over our culture posts. 

I did not find the Friday conversation classes to be beneficial. I think this time could be better used focusing on grammar, or just being structured differently.
If this person is committed to learning Persian and is okay with not getting a high grade in this class, then I would recommend it.
